title: Health and Safety Executive for Northern Ireland

details.short_description: Provides businesses with health and safety information and advice
details.will_continue_on: Health and Safety Executive for Northern Ireland website
details.eligibility: The service is provided for businesses based in Northern Ireland.

details.body:
The Health and Safety Executive for Northern Ireland (HSENI) provides businesses with information and advice regarding effective health and safety practices. Its centre offers:

  • a reference library of health and safety materials in Northern Ireland
  • a health and safety video loaning service
  • a study area
  • health and safety journals
  • the opportunity to speak to an inspector on a confidential basis

HSENI also provide a one-to-one telephone service as well as a freephone service.

details.description: Accidents, health and safety law and workplace conditions
